title: Patch 5.23 Bugs Megathread
body:
Hi everyone!

We're here to help with any patch day issues that you may encounter today! If you do encounter any bugs after patching, please post them here for our team to investigate!

You may also want to check out the Reddit megathread too: https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/3tzol6/523_patch_bugs_megathread/

Cheers,
Zaps

replies.body:
There is a bug with Poppy's ability "Steadfast Presence", it did not correctly disrupt Quinn's ability "Vault".

I was playing poppy jungle, and was ganking a top lane quinn,
I did not use my stun on her just got close to her and stuck next to her thinking that is she tried to "vault" away i would be able to knock her up using "Steadfast Presence".

"Steadfast Presence" didn't work, Quinn "vaulted" away and my faith in poppy was crushed. haha 

Please Fix Rito,
Thanks           {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

A single basic attack by Corki counts as two attacks (instead of one) for Thunderlord's Decree due to its his passive split damage, as his basic attack is not two attacks or spells it should only count as one proc towards the lightning strike.

randomly stopped working one day when that morning was working fine, after 3 re-downloads, its finally up and running, but has cost 5.4GB of data in the process, not happy at all riot, 10% of my MONTHLY data to fix a problem that im not even sure will be fixed once i launch, some form of compensation would be nice as even after (if this even gets fixed) i still wont be able to play much without going over my data limit... 

do it for the friljord
When every i get high crit with graves a giant yellow cone appears behind whatever i shoot idk why tho everyone can see it even in Fog
